To make effective use of a server's resources and their allocation reasonable we recommend applying some useful technologies.

=== Memcached ===

[http://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Memcached Memcached] stores result sets from queries to a database in memory _ (eg MySQL) _. This allows to reduce the number of queries to a database.

See instructions how to install memcached on [http://pureform.wordpress.com/2008/01/10/installing-memcache-on-windows-for-php/ Windows]. To install memcached on Ubuntu enter the following two commands:
(((
sudo aptitude install memcached
sudo aptitude install php5-memcache
)))
